mapper.select: select CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(ir.Invest_Amount_Valid),#{sKey})) as signed) investAmountValid , ir.Invest_Date,ir.Member_ID,ir.Invest_ID from Invest_Record ir where ir.Apply_Id=#{projectID} and ir.IsValid=0
select Repay_ID as repayID from Loan_Repay where Apply_ID = #{applyID} and Statu=0 and IsCompensatory=0 order by Repay_MaxTime asc

{call insertInvestIncome( #{iId , mode=IN, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{repayId, mode=IN, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{investId, mode=IN, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{memberId, mode=IN, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sPrincipal, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sInterest, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ttDate, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sKey, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{result, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER} )}

select sum(CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(SDRecv_Principal),#{sKey})) as signed)) as totalSDRecvPrincipal, sum(CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(SDRecv_Interest),#{sKey})) as signed)) as totalSDRecvInterest from Invest_Income where Repay_Id=#{replayID} and IsValid=0
select SDRecv_MaxTime from Invest_Income where Repay_Id=#{replayID} and IsValid=0 order by Income_Id desc LIMIT 0,1
